alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 2:45AM PST until January 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
